data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the county of Rajsamand.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Rajsamand, Rajasthan, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 1,156,600 people living in Rajsamand through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 12,723 believers in the county of Rajsamand the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Rajsamand, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Rabari (Muslim traditions) people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Rajsamand, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: the county of Rajsamand has (about) 12,723 people who know Jesus, 14,033 people who know about him culturally, and 1,129,844 people who are far from Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the county of Rajsamand, Rajasthan, India has a population of 1,156,600.

We estimate Rajsamand has 12,723 people who might know Jesus, 14,033 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,129,844 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Rajsamand, Rajasthan, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”
